verses.verse: וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Now the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְֽמִסְפָּרָ֡ם <S%H4557><s%> after their number רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> [to wit] the chief הָאָב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> fathers וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and captains הָֽאֲלָפִ֣ים ׀ <S%H505><s%> of thousands וְהַמֵּא֡וֹת <S%H3967><s%> and hundreds וְשֹׁטְרֵיהֶם֩ <S%H7860><s%> and their officers הַמְשָׁרְתִ֨ים <S%H8334><s%> that served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> any דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> in any matter הַֽמַּחְלְק֗וֹת <S%H4256><s%> of the courses הַבָּאָ֤ה <S%H935><s%> which came in וְהַיֹּצֵאת֙ <S%H3318><s%> and went out חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month בְּחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> by month לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all חָדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H2320><s%> throughout all the months הַשָּׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> of the year הַֽמַּחֲלֹ֙קֶת֙ <S%H4256><s%> course הָֽאַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> of every עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

עַ֞ל <S%H5921><s%> and הַמַּחֲלֹ֤קֶת <S%H4256><s%> course הָרִֽאשׁוֹנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> Over the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֔וֹן <S%H7223><s%> for the first יָֽשָׁבְעָ֖ם <S%H3434><s%> [was] Jashobeam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זַבְדִּיאֵ֑ל <S%H2068><s%> of Zabdiel וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַֽחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> Of the children פֶ֗רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> of Perez הָרֹ֛אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [was] the chief לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> of all the captains הַצְּבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of the host לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H7223><s%> for the first

וְעַ֞ל <S%H5921><s%> and over מַחֲלֹ֣קֶת ׀ <S%H4256><s%> And over the course הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <S%H8145><s%> of the second דּוֹדַ֤י <S%H1737><s%> [was] Dodai הָאֲחוֹחִי֙ <S%H266><s%> an Ahohite וּמַ֣חֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and of his course וּמִקְל֖וֹת <S%H4732><s%> [was] Mikloth הַנָּגִ֑יד <S%H5057><s%> also the ruler וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> likewise [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

שַׂ֣ר <S%H8269><s%> captain הַצָּבָ֤א <S%H6635><s%> of the host הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> The third לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> for the third בְּנָיָ֧הוּ <S%H1141><s%> [was] Benaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֛ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> priest רֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> a chief וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

ה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> This בְנָיָ֛הוּ <S%H1141><s%> This [is that] Benaiah גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> [who was] mighty הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> [among] the thirty וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge הַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֑ים <S%H7970><s%> and above the thirty וּמַ֣חֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עַמִּיזָבָ֖ד <S%H5990><s%> [was] Ammizabad בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son ס

הָֽרְבִיעִ֞י <S%H7243><s%> The fourth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרְבִיעִ֗י <S%H7243><s%> [captain] for the fourth עֲשָׂה־ אֵל֙ <S%H6214><s%> [was] Asahel אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> the brother יוֹאָ֔ב <S%H3097><s%> of Joab וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <S%H2069><s%> and Zebadiah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son אַחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> after וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> him and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

הַחַמִישִׁי֙ <S%H2549><s%> The fifth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַחֲמִישִׁ֔י <S%H2549><s%> for the fifth הַשַּׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> captain שַׁמְה֣וּת <S%H8049><s%> [was] Shamhuth הַיִּזְרָ֑ח <S%H3155><s%> the Izrahite וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

הַשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <S%H8345><s%> The sixth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> [captain] for the sixth עִירָ֥א <S%H5896><s%> [was] Ira בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עִקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H6142><s%> of Ikkesh הַתְּקוֹעִ֑י <S%H8621><s%> the Tekoite וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

הַשְּׁבִיעִי֙ <S%H7637><s%> The seventh לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> [captain] for the seventh חֶ֥לֶץ <S%H2503><s%> [was] Helez הַפְּלוֹנִ֖י <S%H6397><s%> the Pelonite מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

הַשְּׁמִינִי֙ <S%H8066><s%> The eighth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <S%H8066><s%> [captain] for the eighth סִבְּכַ֥י <S%H5444><s%> [was] Sibbecai הַחֻשָׁתִ֖י <S%H2843><s%> the Hushathite לַזַּרְחִ֑י <S%H2227><s%> of the Zarhites וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

הַתְּשִׁיעִי֙ <S%H8671><s%> The ninth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַתְּשִׁיעִ֔י <S%H8671><s%> [captain] for the ninth אֲבִיעֶ֥זֶר <S%H44><s%> [was] Abiezer הָעַנְּתֹתִ֖י <S%H6069><s%> the Anetothite [לַבֶּנְיְמִינִי כ] (לַבֵּ֣ן ק) (יְמִינִ֑י <S%H1145><s%> Benjamite ק) וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

הָעֲשִׂירִי֙ <S%H6224><s%> The tenth לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָעֲשִׂירִ֔י <S%H6224><s%> [captain] for the tenth מַהְרַ֥י <S%H4121><s%> [was] Maharai הַנְּטֽוֹפָתִ֖י <S%H5200><s%> the Netophathite לַזַּרְחִ֑י <S%H2227><s%> of the Zarhites וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַֽחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

עַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten לְעַשְׁתֵּ֣י־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month בְּנָיָ֥ה <S%H1141><s%> [was] Benaiah הַפִּרְעָתוֹנִ֖י <S%H6553><s%> the Pirathonite מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand ס

הַשְּׁנֵ֤ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten לִשְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month חֶלְדַּ֥י <S%H2469><s%> [was] Heldai הַנְּטוֹפָתִ֖י <S%H5200><s%> the Netophathite לְעָתְנִיאֵ֑ל <S%H6274><s%> of Othniel וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and in מַחֲלֻקְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4256><s%> and in his course עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> [were] twenty וְאַרְבָּעָ֖ה <S%H702><s%> and four אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand פ

וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> charge שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> Furthermore over the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֣י <S%H7206><s%> of the Reubenites נָגִ֔יד <S%H5057><s%> the ruler אֱלִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H461><s%> [was] Eliezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זִכְרִ֑י <S%H2147><s%> of Zichri ס לַשִּׁ֨מְעוֹנִ֔י <S%H8099><s%> of the Simeonites שְׁפַטְיָ֖הוּ <S%H8203><s%> Shephatiah בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַעֲכָֽה׃ <S%H4601><s%> of Maachah ס

לְלֵוִ֛י <S%H3881><s%> Of the Levites חֲשַׁבְיָ֥ה <S%H2811><s%> Hashabiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קְמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H7055><s%> of Kemuel לְאַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> of the Aaronites צָדֽוֹק׃ <S%H6659><s%> Zadok ס

לִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <S%H3063><s%> Of Judah אֱלִיה֖וּ <S%H453><s%> Elihu מֵאֲחֵ֣י <S%H251><s%> [one] of the brethren דָוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David לְיִ֨שָׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> of Issachar עָמְרִ֖י <S%H6018><s%> Omri בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מִיכָאֵֽל׃ <S%H4317><s%> of Michael ס

לִזְבוּלֻ֕ן <S%H2074><s%> Of Zebulun יִֽשְׁמַֽעְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3460><s%> Ishmaiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֹבַדְיָ֑הוּ <S%H5662><s%> of Obadiah לְנַ֨פְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali יְרִימ֖וֹת <S%H3406><s%> Jerimoth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עַזְרִיאֵֽל׃ <S%H5837><s%> of Azriel ס

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Of the children אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim הוֹשֵׁ֖עַ <S%H1954><s%> Hoshea בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son עֲזַזְיָ֑הוּ <S%H5812><s%> of Azaziah לַחֲצִי֙ <S%H2677><s%> of the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh יוֹאֵ֖ל <S%H3100><s%> Joel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son פְּדָיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H6305><s%> of Pedaiah ס

לַחֲצִ֤י <S%H2677><s%> Of the half הַֽמְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> [tribe] of Manasseh גִּלְעָ֔דָה <S%H1568><s%> in Gilead יִדּ֖וֹ <S%H3035><s%> Iddo בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זְכַרְיָ֑הוּ <S%H2148><s%> of Zechariah ס לְבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin יַעֲשִׂיאֵ֖ל <S%H3300><s%> Jaasiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַבְנֵֽר׃ <S%H74><s%> of Abner ס

לְדָ֕ן <S%H1835><s%> Of Dan עֲזַרְאֵ֖ל <S%H5832><s%> Azareel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְרֹחָ֑ם <S%H3395><s%> of Jeroham אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שָׂרֵ֖י <S%H8269><s%> These [were] the princes שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נָשָׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> took דָוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> But David מִסְפָּרָ֔ם <S%H4557><s%> not the number לְמִבֶּ֛ן <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> of them from twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years וּלְמָ֑טָּה <S%H4295><s%> and under כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> had said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God לְהַרְבּ֥וֹת <S%H7235><s%> he would increase אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <S%H3556><s%> like to the stars הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> of the heavens
